About Us

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.0.6″ background_color=”#eeeeee”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.0.6″ width=”60%” module_alignment=”center”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Overview” _builder_version=”4.0.6″]

Douglas M. Ellie, President

Doug’s impeccable reputation and qualifications will be utilized completely in your search.

“Doug’s skills at pairing professionals with the right client, as well as his knowledge of “the art of the interview” is unsurpassed. If Doug is advocating on your behalf, to find your next position, you are in great hands.” – Terence Weston, CDIP, CCS 

“He’s a honest, dedicated, and a very personable recruiter. I’ve dealt with many recruiters in my career, and Doug is by far the best out there! I would definitely recommend him to anyone looking to for a career change.” – Alesha Andrews, RHIT, CCDS, CDIP, CCS

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.0.6″]

Douglas M. Ellie

Doug is the President of H.I.M. Recruiters where he works with HIM professionals and clients on a daily basis.

In 2009, he earned a certificate in Healthcare Informatics from St. Petersburg College. Doug also earned a Bachelor’s Degree in Finance from the University of Florida. Prior to joining HIM Recruiters Doug worked in several financial roles most recently as the Chief Financial Officer & IT Manager for one of the largest real estate companies in the state of Florida.

He holds an active Florida real estate license and assists our candidates with their relocation needs as needed.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.1″]

Learn more about Founder, Perry E. Ellie:

› Perry’s complete Curriculum Vitae

As “Your Peer In Professional Placement,” Perry works nationwide with thousands of Health Information Management professionals in career consulting, employment searches and permanent placement.

Perry has held positions from HIM clerk to department director. He has also served a Health Information educator and in numerous volunteer leadership roles at the local, state and national levels. He is a former President and Distinguished Service Award recipient of the Florida Information Management Association. Perry is currently “thrilled” to be serving a three year term on the American Health Information Management Association (AHIMA) Board of Directors.

His Career Management expertise has been shared in numerous presentations and publications including the Journal of AHIMA and the book, HIM Journeys: A Career Guide for Health Information Management Professionals.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.3.2″ background_color=”#82be5a” background_image=”https://www.himjobs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/cta-bkgd.jpg” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_module=”572″ collapsed=”off”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.0.6″ collapsed=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_cta title=”Start Your Job Search” button_url=”https://www.himjobs.com/jobs/” button_text=”Search All Jobs” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ background_enable_color=”off”]

View all of the HIM job opportunities available now.

[/et_pb_cta][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
